title: Citi May Finally Slip Its Cuffs
text:
Citi May Finally Slip Its Cuffs Stronger-than-expected results could help boost the bankâ€™s valuation By July 16, 2015 3:59 p.m. ET 
Citigroup looks like it could be ready for parole. 
The $4.8 billion second-quarter profit the bank reported Thursday was far stronger than expected. Excluding accounting adjustments and the impact of a mortgage-litigation settlement that nearly... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In Popular on WSJ
